<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/artifact/tag"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Remove a tag from an artifact.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["fqn","versionHash","tag"],"properties":{"fqn":{"type":"object","description":"Fully qualified name of an artifact.","required":["source","author","name"],"properties":{"source":{"type":"string","description":"The source of the artifact."},"author":{"type":"string","description":"The author of the artifact."},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the artifact."}},"title":"FQN"},"versionHash":{"type":"string","description":"The version hash of the artifact to untag."},"tag":{"type":"string","description":"The tag to remove from the artifact."}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Tag removed from artifact successfully."},"400":{"description":"The request was malformed or invalid.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ErrGeneric"}}}},"401":{"description":"The provided authentication credentials were invalid."},"403":{"description":"The authenticated user does not have permission to access the requested resource."},"404":{"description":"The requested resource was not found.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ErrGeneric"}}}},"413":{"description":"The request payload is too large.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ErrGeneric"}}}},"500":{"description":"An internal server error occurred. Look at the server logs for more details."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
